column1: Uchi////It was our first try Uchi. The first thing need to do was search on Yelp. After read all the pictures online. We ordered Four fishes. The pictures showed all the information. We were so happy ate some food before came in. How small size of the food! 4 dishes+2 beer+1 cup of wine=108. We can't imaging if we didn't eat any food before came in.
